results.headline: ACROSS THE SEA OF TIME (MOVIE)

link.suggested_link_text: Read the New York Times Review of Across the Sea of Time

results.summary_short: IMAX turns touristy with "Across the Sea of Time," a 3-D adventure. As a journey through Manhattan with stops in Central Park, on Broadway and on the subway, it shows off New York's wonders with a World's Fair wholesomeness that is likely to play better out of town. Earlier IMAX ventures have taken audiences to the skies and to the ocean floor, but many of the sights here are readily available only a few blocks from this theater. They seem familiar, even if real-life New York Rollerbladers aren't actually eight stories high.
